snippet: Japan’s nuclear watchdog agency summoned the Tokyo Electric Power Company to explain the repeated accidents and spills that have plagued the Fukushima nuclear plant since its meltdown in 2011.
abstract: Japan's nuclear watchdog agency criticizes Tokyo Electric Power Company for mistakes that allowed radioactive water to leak from crippled Fukushima nuclear plant into Pacific Ocean; demands explanations for accidents and orders Tepco to fix problem quickly.
lead_paragraph: Japan’s nuclear watchdog agency summoned the Tokyo Electric Power Company to explain the repeated accidents and spills that have plagued the Fukushima nuclear plant since its meltdown in 2011.

headline.main: Company Is Scolded for Mistakes at Fukushima
headline.print_headline: Company Is Scolded For Mistakes At Fukushima
